housing

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • housing.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a mortgage-lender (i.e. a bank or building society). Its only function is to approve/decline mortgage requests, so this is where mortgage-lending policy is encoded.
    Author:
    daniel, davidrpugh

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Bank.Config
      This object holds the configutation for the Bank.
      static class  Bank.Diagnostics
      This object interfaces to the MASON visualisation

      • requestLoan

        public MortgageApproval requestLoan(Household h,
                                    double housePrice,
                                    double desiredDownPayment,
                                    boolean isHome)
        Use this to arrange a Mortgage and get a MortgageApproval object.
        Parameters:
        h - The household that is requesting the mortgage.
        housePrice - The price of the house that 'h' wants to buy
        isHome - true if 'h' plans to live in the house.
        Returns:
        The MortgageApproval object, or NULL if the mortgage is declined

      • getMaxMortgage

        public double getMaxMortgage(Household h,
                             boolean isHome)
        Find the maximum mortgage that this mortgage-lender will approve to a household.
        Parameters:
        h - The household who is applying for the mortgage
        isHome - true if 'h' plans to live in the house
        Returns:
        The maximum value of house that this mortgage-lender is willing to approve a mortgage for.

      • loanToValue

        public double loanToValue(Household h,
                          boolean isHome)
        Get the Loan-To-Value ratio applicable to a given household.
        Parameters:
        h - The houshold that is applying for the mortgage
        isHome - true if 'h' plans to live in the house
        Returns:
        The loan-to-value ratio applicable to the given household.
